VoiceList.Entry: Cait Sith “Heidegger is going after you all.”
“That's why it's dangerous out there. Let's go underground!”
Cait Sith “This way!”
Cloud “Alright,let's go!”
Tifa “What's wrong? Are you still looking for something?”
Cid “What's wrong? You're blowing us off!”
Barret “Wassup,Mr. Monster? What're you lookin' at?”
Red XIII “Something's wrong…”
Cait Sith “What's going on?”
Vincent “Doesn't look like it's after us. Something else…”
Yuffie “Huh? It's looking somewhere else. Doesn't it want to fight us?”
Cloud “No,it's…feeling something. …Yeah,it senses murder.”
Tifa “Let's go to the Airship!”
Cid “To my ship!”
Barret “Let's go back to the Highwind!”
Red XIII “Let's watch from the Airship!”
Cait Sith “Let's go back to the Airship.”
Vincent “We should go back to the ship now.”
Yuffie “OK,can we GO now!?”
Cait Sith “Oh no! We gotta get outta here!”
“Something big… I'm talkin' REALLY BIG's comin'!”
Cait Sith “Oh no! Let's hurry out of here!”
“Something big… I'm talkin' REALLY BIG's comin'!”
Bugenhagen “This is…”
Bugenhagen “Yes…exactly…”
Cloud “Are you getting something?”
Bugenhagen “…Give me a moment.”
Bugenhagen “The knowledge of the Ancients swirling around here is telling me one thing.”
Bugenhagen “The Planet's in a crisis…”
Bugenhagen “A crisis beyond human power or endless time.”
“It says,when the time comes, we must search for 'Holy'.”
Cloud “Holy?”
Bugenhagen “Holy…the ultimate White Magic. Magic that might stand against Meteor. Perhaps our last hope to save the Planet from Meteor.”
Bugenhagen “If a soul seeking Holy reaches the Planet, it will appear.”
Bugenhagen “Ho Ho Hooo.”
“Meteor,Weapon, everything will disappear.”
Bugenhagen “Perhaps,even ourselves.”
Cloud “Even us!?”
Bugenhagen “It is up to the Planet to decide.”
Bugenhagen “What is best for the Planet. What is bad for the Planet.”
“All that is bad will disappear. That is all.”
Bugenhagen “Ho Ho Hooo.”
“I wonder which we humans are?”
Cloud “Search for Holy… How do we do it?”
Bugenhagen “Speak to the Planet.”
“Get the White Materia… This will bond the Planet to humans.”
“Then speak to the Planet.”
“If our wish reaches the Planet, the White Materia will begin to glow a pale green.”
Cloud “…This is the end.”
Cloud “Aeris had the White Materia…”
Cloud “But when Aeris died,it fell from the altar…”
Cloud “That's why…this is the end.”
Bugenhagen “Ho Ho Hooo!”
Bugenhagen “Ho Ho Hooo!”
Bugenhagen “Ho Ho Hooo!”
Bugenhagen “Look at this!”
Cloud “!?”
Bugenhagen “Ho Ho Hooo… the key…”
“It is written about the key here…”
Bugenhagen “Ancients' writing.”
Cloud “Can you read it?”
Barret “Damn,dude,you're really somethin'”
Tifa “You're really something,Bugenhagen!!”
Red XIII “Wow,grandpa!”
Cait Sith “Wow!”
Cid “Way to go,gramps! You're not just another old coot!”
Vincent “I never expected to find a person who could read and understand this difficult writing nowadays.”
Yuffie “Really?”
Bugenhagen “It's all Greek to me!!”
Cloud “This's no time for jokes…”
Bugenhagen “I'm not an Ancient. I can't read this thing!”
Bugenhagen “I may be old,but my eyes aren't completely bad yet. Look closely below the writing.”
Cloud “There's something written in chalk… …(even sunlight can't reach)…(Key)”
Bugenhagen “It was probably written by a scientist who's been here… He probably used all his energy to make out these two words.”
Cloud “So this note points to where the key is?”
Cloud “Key…? To what?”
Bugenhagen “I don't know… But,it probably has something to do with our riddle.”
“The riddle…then it must have something to do with Aeris.”
Cloud “There's a note written in chalk… …(key)…(in the Music Box)”
Cloud “What does it mean?”
Bugenhagen “That Music Box over there. We'll put the key in it.”
Bugenhagen “Probably…”
“Use these words as clues and go find the key.”
“I'll continue to figure out the Ancients' writing.”
Cloud “A place (Even sunlight won't reach) is where the (key) is,right?”
Bugenhagen “When you find the key,or when you can't go any further,come back here.”
“Maybe I'll understand more from the writing and get some new information for you.”
Bugenhagen “Remember,a place (even sunlight can't reach) is where the (key) is…”
Bugenhagen “(even sunlight can't reach)… Hmm…if we're above ground, the sunlight reaches everywhere… Then it's probably not above ground…”
Bugenhagen “A place where sunlight doesn't reach… Right,it must be underwater!”
Cloud “Underwater? There's…no way… We need a submarine…”
Cloud “Wait. Submarine…I think there's one at Junon Port.”
Bugenhagen “Oh! You've found it!”
Bugenhagen “I'll go use the key. You all wait here.”
“And watch closely what happens.”
Bugenhagen “Now,go inside. Hope may be inside… Or…”
Bugenhagen “This was just a screen to project an image!”
“Look! Look at the image projected on the screen of the water!”
Cloud “…It's glowing.”
Bugenhagen “Ho Ho Hooo!! It's pale green!!”
Cloud “…Aeris. Aeris has already prayed for Holy.”
“…After I gave up the Black Materia to Sephiroth… Aeris's words came into my dreams…”
“She said,she was the only one who could stop Sephiroth… And to do that,there was a secret here…”
“That was Holy… That's why,she had the White Materia. Aeris knew about here… and what she had to do.”
“Aeris has left us great hope. But,it cost her life… her future…”
Cloud “I'm sorry…Aeris. I should have figured this out sooner.”
“…You left without saying a word… It was all so sudden,I couldn't think…”
“That's why it took so long for me to find out… But,Aeris…I understand now.”
“Aeris… I'll do the rest.”
Tifa “You mean,WE…”
Barret “That's 'WE'!”
Red XIII “WE'LL take care of it.”
Cid “You &^$#%^! It's WE! WE!”
Cait Sith “It's WE! Isn't it WE?”
Vincent “I? …you mean WE.”
Yuffie “Not I,dorkus! WE!”
Tifa “What Aeris left us… We shouldn't waste.”
Barret “The thing Aeris left for us… We gotta take care of it.”
Red XIII “We can't waste what Aeris left for us.”
Cid “The flower girl gave us a big chance… It'd be sad if we didn't finish it!”
Cait Sith “What Aeris left us… We mustn't let go to waste…”
Vincent “The hope she left us… We must make stronger…”
Yuffie “We've gotta take a chance on the hope she left us!”
Cloud “Thank you…Aeris.”
Cloud “Aeris's voice has already reached the Planet. Just look at the glow of the White Materia.”
“But…how about Holy? How come Holy isn't moving?”
Cloud “Why?”
Bugenhagen “Something's getting in its way.”
Cloud “…Him…”
“He's the only one that could do it.”
Cloud “…Sephiroth. Where are you?”
Cait Sith “H…Hey!”
Cloud “What the?”
Cait Sith “…whisper…whisper… (sorry I was a little surprised).”
Cloud “What happened?”
Cait Sith “You remember when the Junon Cannon disappeared? Actually,Rufus moved it.”
Cait Sith “You remember when the Junon Cannon disappeared? Actually,Rufus moved it.”
Cloud “Moved it? That big thing? Where? Why?”
Cait Sith “Rufus wants to destroy Sephiroth with it.”
Cait Sith “That cannon operates on Huge Materia. But the Huge Materia has already been used in the Rocket Plan.”
“So since the cannon's useless right now, he decided to move it.”
Cait Sith “To a place where Materia… no,where Mako is gathered…”
Cloud “And,where is that!?”
Cloud “It's similar.”
Cloud “I didn't notice it the last time I came.”
Cloud “This place…is similar to the inside of the Lifestream.”
Cloud “…All the different noise.”
Cloud “…The noise doesn't go through your ears but directly into your head.”
Cloud “It seems to mean something… but I can't quite get it. I hate not knowing what it is.”
Cloud “That's what this is similar to.”
Tifa “Now that you mention it…”
Cid “Now that you mention it…”
Barret “Now that you mention it…”
Red XIII “Now that you mention it…”
Cait Sith “Now that you mention it…”
Yuffie “Now that you mention it…”
Vincent “Now that you mention it…”
Tifa “My head feels like it's getting crushed.”
Cid “My head feels like it's gettin' crushed!”
Barret “My head feels like it's gettin' crushed.”
Red XIII “My head feels like it's getting crushed.”
Cait Sith “My head,it's about to be crushed.”
Yuffie “My head's about to pop.”
Vincent “My head is about to be crushed.”
Cloud “So Aeris came here too… She stood in this exact spot…”
Cloud “Hmm… Aeris didn't have to come here.”
“She was able to find out all the information here.”
“What Aeris needed was that altar…and only that.”
Cloud “Aeris… “Aeris… What were you planning to do?”
Cloud “What…are we supposed to do?”
Aeris “Cloud,can you hear me?”
Cloud “Yeah,I hear you. Sorry for what happened.”
Aeris “Don't worry about it.”
Cloud “…I can't help it…”
Aeris “Oh…”
Aeris “Then,why don't you REALLY worry about it?”
Aeris “And let me handle Sephiroth.”
Aeris “And Cloud, you take care of yourself.”
Aeris “So you don't have a breakdown,okay?”
Cloud “What is this place?”
Aeris “This forest leads to the City of the Ancients… and is called the Sleeping Forest.”
Aeris “It's only a matter of time before Sephiroth uses Meteor.”
“That's why I'm going to protect it. Only a survivor of the Cetra, like me,can do it.”
Aeris “The secret is just up here.”
Aeris “At least it should be. …I feel it. It feels like I'm being led by something.”
Aeris “Then,I'll be going now. I'll come back when it's all over.”
Cloud “Aeris?”
Sephiroth “Hmm… So she's going to interfere? She'll be a difficult one,don't you think?”
Sephiroth “We must stop that girl soon.”
Tifa “…Cloud.”
